Based on ibn Kathir's Stories of the Prophets.
Note: \n A.S. stands for Alayhisalam, peace be unto him. \n Prophets are represented in white.
Bismillah... In the name of Allah...

touch.question: Who is the first human? Prophet Muhammad Prophet Nuh Prophet Adam

touch.narrate: Allah the Exalted said to the angels that he \n will create Adam (a.s.), the first human.
Allah the Almighty said,"I am going to place \n mankind generations after generation on Earth."

touch.question: What did the angels say? Humans are going to do evil. Humans will do good. Angels are evil

touch.narrate: The angels said," Will you place mankind who \n will do evil and kill, while angels praise and \n thank You?"
Allah said, "I know and you don't know."

touch.question: What did Allah create Adam a.s. with? Metal Clay Wood

touch.narrate: Allah created Adam with clay.

touch.question: Who is Jibreel? Angel Jinn Alien

touch.narrate: Allah the Almighty sent the angel Jibreel \n (Gabriel) to get clay from Earth.

touch.question: What did the angel Jibreel return with? Clay Nothing Wisdom

touch.narrate: When Jibreel arrived, the earth asked Allah to \n protect it from Gabriel taking the clay.
Gabriel returned with nothing, and said to Allah, \n "My Lord, the land asked for Your protection, \n and it was given."

touch.question: Who did Allah s.w.t. send next? Angel of Death Michael Israfil

touch.narrate: Then, Allah sent the angel Michael to take clay.
The earth said the same thing to Michael.
Finally, Allah sent the Angel of Death to do \n take clay from Earth.
The Earth asked Allah for protection.

touch.question: Why did the Angel of Death say? I won't return without getting clay. I'll get the cheese. I ask Allah to protect you Earth.

touch.narrate: But the Angel of Death said, "I also ask Allah to \n not return without getting the clay."

touch.question: Why are there different kinds of human beings? The clay was taken from Mars. The clay was painted. The clay was taken from different lands.

touch.narrate: The clay was taken from different lands so \n mankind would be full of different people.
Allah soaked the clay and shaped it into a human \n being.

touch.question: When did Allah blow the soul into Adam? Right after he shaped it. After fourty years. In ten years.

touch.narrate: The human figure remained standing still for \n fourty years.
The angels and Iblis (Satan) were scared of it.
After fourty years, the soul was blown into the \n human being, Adam a.s.

touch.question: What happenned when the soul went into the body? Adam a.s. coughed. He sneezed. He threwup.

touch.narrate: When the soul went inside Adam a.s., Adam \n sneezed.

touch.question: What did the angels say? Your Lord has gven you mercy. Astaghfirullah Alhamdulilah.

touch.narrate: The angels said to Adam, "Say Alhamdulilah \n (all praise belongs to Allah)."
Adam repeated, "Alhamdulilah."

touch.question: What do you say when someone sneezes? Insha Allah Masha Allah Yarhamukullah

touch.narrate: Allah said to Adam, "Your Lord has given you \n mercy."
Allah told the angels to bow down to Adam out of \n respect.
Everyone bowed down except Iblis.

touch.question: Why didn't Iblis bow down as well? He thought fire is better than clay. He thought clay was good. He didn't like bowing.

touch.narrate: He said,"Why must I bow down to the one \n you created from clay?"
He thought fire was better than clay.
Allah said to Iblis,"Get down from this Paradise, \n it is not a place for you to act arrogant."
Iblis said, "Allow me time until the Day of \n Judgement."

touch.question: Why did Iblis want time? He wanted to play. He wanted Adam and his children to go to hell. He wanted to asked for forgiveness.

touch.narrate: He wanted to make Adam's children go to Hell.
Allah the Almighty said, "You are allowed time."
Allah the Almighty told Adam to meet with the \n angels.

touch.question: How did the angels greet Adam? Hello! How's it going? Peace be unto you.

touch.narrate: Adam went to the angels and the angels said, \n "Peace be unto you and the mercy and \n blessings of Allah."
Allah the Almighty said to Adam,"This is the way \n you and your children greet."
The dust was taken from different lands \n so mankind would be full of different people.
The dust was shaped into a human being \n and his spirit was blown in.
After, Allah the Exalted told the angels \n to bow down to Adam a.s.
The angels bowed down except for Iblees, \n who is also Satan.
He said,"Why must I bow down to the one \n you created from clay?"
He thought fire was better than clay.
Then, Allah granted Adam knowledge and \n gave Adam the desire to learn.
